sen.j: 片山九郎右衛門（かたやま くろうえもん）は能シテ方観世流の京都片山家における当主名。
sen.e: Kuroemon KATAYAMA is the name of the family head in the Kyoto Katayama family of shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school of Noh.
Kuroemon KATAYAMA is the name of the family head of the Kyoto Katayama family, of shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school of Noh.
sen.cmt: in→of と修正し、カンマを挿入しました。
sen.e: Kuroemon KATAYAMA is the name of the family head of the Kyoto Katayama family, of shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school of Noh.

sen.j: 古くから禁裏能の立方として活躍し、「観世流の京都所司代（京都探題）」などと俗称される。
sen.e: Performed as a Noh actor (as opposed to a musician) of "Kinri" (the Imperial Palace) Noh through the ages, it is commonly called 'Kyoto shoshidai (The Kyoto deputy or The Kyoto Commissioner) in Kanze school'

Performed as a tachi-kata (as opposed to the musicians in noh plays) of "Kinri" (the Imperial Palace) Noh through the ages, it is commonly called 'Kyoto shoshidai [The Kyoto deputy or The Kyoto Commissioner] of Kanze school.'
sen.cmt: 「立方」の部分を意味が通るように修正しました。引用符内のカッコを修正しました。in→of,ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: Performed as a tachi-kata (as opposed to the musicians in noh plays) of "Kinri" (the Imperial Palace) Noh through the ages, it is commonly called 'Kyoto shoshidai [The Kyoto deputy or The Kyoto Commissioner] of Kanze school.'
